basics.name: Gabin CHARLEMAGNE
basics.label: 4th Year ISEN Engineering Student in AI
basics.summary: 4th-year AI engineering student. Currently seeking a 3-month internship in artificial intelligence starting March 2026 in Île-de-France.

work.name: NEXT Model Management
work.summary: International modeling, developing communication skills and rapid adaptation to diverse cultures.
responsibilities: Represented brand image across multiple international markets.
Adapted quickly to diverse cultural environments.
achievements: Enhanced communication skills and cultural adaptability through international assignments.

work.name: Marvilla Parks
work.summary: Managed a flow of approximately 300 customers per day, of which 70% were English-speaking. Developed interpersonal and organizational skills.
responsibilities: Managed daily operations for high-volume customer service.
Coordinated service for 300 daily customers, including 70% English speakers.
achievements: Demonstrated strong interpersonal and organizational skills in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.

work.name: Mysterium Escape Games
work.summary: Supervised activities and managed user experience for groups of up to 10 people. Utilized the Kanban framework.
responsibilities: Supervised game sessions for groups of up to 10 participants.
Implemented the Kanban framework to optimize task flow and scheduling.
achievements: Improved operational efficiency and user satisfaction through effective supervision and innovative task management.

work.name: STMicroelectronics
work.summary: Learned about the operation of a production line. Collaborated in a high-precision technical environment.
responsibilities: Assisted in the operation of a production line within a high-precision cleanroom environment.
Collaborated with team members to maintain production quality.
achievements: Acquired practical experience with technical production processes and contributed to rigorous quality standards.

projects.name: Multichannel Inclusive Chatbot
projects.description: LLM-based assistant designed for people with disabilities, integrating accessibility technologies and customized interfaces.

projects.name: 3D Game
projects.description: AI mechanics and physics in a 3D environment.
